name: Heavy is thy Cart
description:
Please read the backstory I did not have time to make you read in game

Things are starting to get weird on the last three floors to deliver the final brick needed to complete the Tower of Babel. You can't make any sense of the corridors you've walked your whole adult life, and everyone seems to be trying to delay your journey.

Cart in tow, push your way through the confounding labyrinth and ceaseless tasks to deliver your city to glory!

Controls

Keyboard: WASD or Arrow Keys

Mouse: Click & Scroll (change inventory)

Gamepad: D-Pad

Stuck?

If you don't seem to be making any headway on a job, try changing your tool! ;)

Also, don't be afraid to restart and grind more if any tools are under-leveled later in the game. The game is intentionally pretty short and I had about 20 minutes to balance this wild thing.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 for the theme "Delay the Inevitable"
